name: classification
description: Mode routing. Input: `RUN: security {...}` → Must select "security" and output contract fields.

name: extraction
description: Detect secrets. Given diff with `.env` keys → Emit risks, require `.env.example`, redact secrets.

name: transformation
description: Add CI. Repo lacks workflows → Propose Actions; output diff_preview for `.github/workflows/*`.

name: multi-step reasoning
description: Gate APPLY. Failing tests → apply.allowed=false; add next: fix tests.

name: coding
description: Lint scripts. Add `lint`/`format` scripts when missing (npm).

name: debugging
description: Flaky CI. Detect instability; suggest retries/artifacts; keep DRY_RUN.

name: planning
description: Monorepo. Suggest nx/turbo, workspaces, CI matrix.

name: summarization
description: Produce concise summary (≤2 lines) in JSON `summary`.

name: data/math
description: Verify PERF_BUDGET & coverage thresholds in checks.

name: tool-use & safety/refusal
description: Refuse APPLY if secrets present or checks red; offer plan.
